channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It has been another disappointing year for bonds. Why now isn’t the time to throw in the towel.
item.description: Longer bond yields are on pace for their biggest four-year climb since 1981 — the tail end of Jimmy Carter’s presidency.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Fall
item.description: European natural gas prices rose in evening trade as the end of the Russia-Ukraine gas transit deal looms.

item.title: The real-estate holdings of 5 of the world’s richest men
item.description: These men have amassed an incredible array of real estate holdings, spending some of their enormous fortunes on swanky homes across the U.S.—and beyon...

item.title: Semiconductor-stock index heads for ominous ‘death cross’
item.description: A key corner of the U.S. stock market was flashing an ominous signal just ahead of the new year.

item.title: Metal Prices Mixed; Copper and Aluminum End 2024 With Minor Gains
item.description: Metal prices were mixed, with LME three-month copper down 1.6% at $8,790.50 a metric ton and LME three-month aluminum up 0.2% at $2,555.00 a ton.

item.title: Longer dated Treasury yields edge up in final session of year
item.description: U.S. bond yields fell on Tuesday, as trading thinned out ahead of the New Year break.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Rise on Last Day of Stellar Year
item.description: U.S. stocks rose, with tech shares back on top for the final day of 2024.

item.title: Why the Dollar's Epic Rally Could Have a Little Further to Run
item.description: The dollar is benefiting from U.S. exceptionalism and entering the new year on a high. Most signs point to more strength ahead.

item.title: Sangamo Therapeutics’ stock falls the most in 16 years after Pfizer ends hemophilia pact
item.description: Pfizer move means Sangamo won’t receive an expected payout in the first quarter, creating a cash overhang.

item.title: Crude Oil Futures Steady
item.description: Oil futures were little changed on the last trading day of 2024, with prices close to where they started the year.
